description: This file sets up a knowledge base with documents and metadata, initializes a vector database, and performs a query using an agent with filtering capabilities. It includes downloading sample data, configuring a vector database, and executing a filtered search.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a connection to a LanceDB vector database, used for storing and querying vector data.

classes.name: TextKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a collection of text documents with associated metadata, stored in a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that performs knowledge-based queries with filtering capabilities, acting as an interface for querying the knowledge base.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample data files for testing knowledge filters.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads documents into the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the agent based on a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
